QuestData.Title: A Refugee's Quandary
QuestData.Description: I was on my way to join my fellow gnomes at Gnomeregan, but then it all went so horribly wrong!$b$bI left Anvilmar, bags packed and wading through waist-deep snow. Then we had this ridiculous earthquake, and I got all turned around. I ended up here, and what's worse: the trolls stole all my stuff!$b$b$n, I've obviously proven myself to be quite incompetent over the last day and a half. Would you mind infiltrating the troll camps southwest of here and returning my stuff to me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain Felix's Box, Felix's Chest and Felix's Bucket of Bolts.
QuestData.CompletionText: Once I get my tools, I'm outta here.
QuestData.RewardText: Huzzah, you've found them! Get ready, women of Gnomeregan: here comes Felix!$b$bNow, which road takes me out of here...
